h2_title: Buddha's Right Hand Boss Fight and Guide
content: Defeating this monster will award you an actual Buddha's Right Hand Key Item. Once you locate the Buddha's Left Hand deeper into the Webbed Hollow, you'll be able to bring both to the Shen Monkey in the Zodiac Village to craft a unique Gourd!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Buddha's_Right_Hand.md', within the main section titled 'Buddha's Right Hand', specifically from the subsection 'Buddha's Right Hand Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Defeating this monster will award you an actual Buddha's Right Hand Key Item. Once you locate the Buddha's Left Hand deeper into the Webbed Hollow, you'll be able to bring both to the Shen Monkey in the Zodiac Village to craft a unique Gourd!
